title: Do Mormons and Muslims have 'designated drinkers'? - Quora
tags: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (Mormons)

response.answer_text: I would like to know about the “designated drinkers” programs. I may want to sign up. In my younger years, I took scores of Saudi students on trips with me, a few to Mexico City. I don’t remember anyone of them ever drinking anything but tea. In an earlier period of my life, I poured over English Literature with a broad number of University of Utah students, some “Mormon” some “Gentile.” There again, I don’t remember anyone ever drinking anything but water to swallow down a No-Doze pill or two.
Mormons don’t drink. Not at all. Faithful, obedient ones don’t, anyway. So what would be the purpose of having a designated drinker? I’m less knowledgeable about Muslims, but I imagine it’s the same.
